title: Windows Phone Company App Distribution Update Code Signing Certificate
body:
The Code Signing Certificate for Windows Phone expires every year and I need to sign the company app with the new certificate.

The device are managed by a MDM and App, Company Hub & Aetx are distributed by this systems.

I'm not sure what's the right way to update this.

  • Link the new signed app and uninstall the old one on the device and then install it again
  • if I just link the new app I can't see that it gets update probably because it's the same App
